Hello Adventurer,

I'm sorry to put you in this situtation but here are the rules of the game:

-You have 6 lives
-Every time you guess a letter wrong, you lose a life and Spider-Man comes closer to his doom.
-Help Spiderman not experience something extremely violent by guessing correctly.
-Don't worry tho, hints can give you 1 letter at the cost of a life... use wisely!

Good Luck and don't let Spider-Man down!

Sincerely,
